titleStmt.title: David his oath of allegeance to Ierusalem The sermon preached on Act Sunday last in the morning, in St. Maries in Oxford. By Daniel Price Doctor in Divinity.
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Davids oath of allegiance to Ierusalem.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
